code:
-spec sum_indices_with_k_set_bits(Nums :: [integer()], K :: integer()) -> integer().
sum_indices_with_k_set_bits(Nums, K) ->
    sum_indices_with_k_set_bits(Nums, K, 0, 0).

sum_indices_with_k_set_bits([], _K, _Index, Accumulator) ->
    Accumulator;
sum_indices_with_k_set_bits([Head | Tail], K, Index, Accumulator) ->
    BitsSet = count_set_bits(Index, 0),
    NewAccumulator = if
        BitsSet == K -> Accumulator + Head;
        true -> Accumulator
    end,
    sum_indices_with_k_set_bits(Tail, K, Index + 1, NewAccumulator).

count_set_bits(0, Count) ->
    Count;
count_set_bits(N, Count) when N > 0 ->
    NewCount = Count + (N band 1),
    count_set_bits(N bsr 1, NewCount).
